features: 【Cute & Stylish】: It's the evolution of kids headphones--great sound quality and a cute, fun, kid-friendly design. Your little ones will love the iClever cat ear headphones, whose RGB LED lights are controlled by one independent button. When pressed in Bluetooth mode, it will turn off the lights to extend use time.

【Kid-Safe Volume Limited】:Kids' ears are sensitive and can be damaged by loud audio. Keep an eye on their safety with the volume limiter, which allowed you to press "+" and "-" buttons simultaneously to switch from 74, 85 or 94 dB, and it won't changed accidentally.Let your kids have fun at a volume that's safe for them.

【Wireless & Wired】: It's always better to have options! Thanks to the built-in rechargeable battery, these headphones pack up to 50 hrs of listening (with the RGB light off). If the juice is running low, you can also use a standard 3.5mm audio cable to switch to wired mode to keep using with Smart phones, iPad,tablets, PCs.

【Comfortable & Foldable】: Kids headphones should be comfortable if they will be used for a long time. Suitable for kids aged 3-16, they come with adjustable headband and soft, skin-friendly ear pads. Designed with ergonomics in mind, the silicone headband doesn't apply uncomfortable pressure to kid's head. They even fold up for easy traveling!

【Durable Design, Generous Warranty】: Your kids play rough and ours do too. These kids over ear headphones can stand up to the tough treatment due to the durable design. We ensure your satisfaction with this product, and if you have any problems with the kids wireless headphones, just holler at us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FREAKING ADORABE, FUN, HILARIOUS. FIT ADULTS TOO.
reviews.reviewText: LOVE THESE!I bought them to be an aggressive visual suggestion to my nosey gossipy coworkers the I will absolutely NOT be discussing my shift partner quitting, and that I do not care to hear anybody else do so either.They are SUPER CUTE and comfortable. The light-up feature is just the right amount of special effects that can be turned off and on at the touch of a button.Sound quality is OUTSTANDING; even my husband thinks they're AWESOME and he is ridiculously critical of sound quality from audio devices.They charge quickly and efficiently. The battery life seems highly adequate; I've been using them for hours and they're still showing over 70% charged. I imaging the battery would drop a bit faster if the lights were left on continuously, but not dramatically.They come with a 3' cord with an eighth inch jack at each end so that the headphones my be used hardwired to a player, computer, etc. It works perfectly.The charger cable they come with is comically short (about 8"), but does the job. The length is just enough to charge the headphones by plugging them into a laptop or powerbank. Luckily, I have loads of longer cables if I need to plug into a power source that is further than 8" from the nearest table top.I see what some other reviewers mean when they talk about the folding mechanism being a bit delicate. It locks in place when the headphones are unfolded; if anything, it isn't that they're so particularly delicate as that it locks so well that it feels as though you might break them if you push them too hard to unlock and fold them. But as long as one is not thoughtlessly aggressive/utterly careless folding them up, there's no reason they should break.It's nice that it has 3 maximum decibel levels that can be set and changed easily. Makes it much more difficult to accidentally blow your own eardrums out/control your child's listening volume.I cannot say enough nice things about these headphones. They work beautifully. Are FUN AS HECK at any age. And are BRILLIANT at driving the point home that one has precisely Zero interest in participating in, or listening to useless gossipy nonsense.100 out of 10 would buy repeatedly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They are amazing! Super cute, comfortable to wear, sound quality is great, and kiddo approved! Definitely get these! They charge pretty quick and the battery lasts a while. I will say the battery lasts alot longer if the lights aren’t on but the lights are the best part

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and functional
reviews.reviewText: Gave our daughter these headphones for Christmas. She was so excited. The design is cute and functional with ear pieces that are comfortable and fit over her small ears. The light up effects are fun but could be a little distracting in dark places (think driving in the car) Be sure to hang onto the cords that come with, she did lose her headphone jack right away which lead to some tears.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute and work great
reviews.reviewText: I was super surprised at the full functionality of these headphones. My granddaughter uses them daily and loves them. The sound is excellent and the blinking lights of the ears just make them even cuter. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Impressive for the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for myself (an adult) and they fit just fine. Very uncomfortable wearing with glasses but that's an issue with many headphones so I can't hold it against these. I didn't expect too much at this price point but I was impressed with the sound quality of these headphones. The flashing lights are cute and fun addition. I haven't pushed the battery life to the end but they've easily lasted all day.The headphones don't look super sturdy but they seem far stronger than they appear. I don't use the folding function so I can't say anything about it.Overall, I've been impressed with these considering the price. I'll update if that changes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are super well made & next level adorable. Plus they are user friendly; my 3 year old daughter adores them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These headphones are amazing
reviews.reviewText: My daughter looovvveeessss these headphones. They are comfortable on her ears, they light up, and they charge quickly / the battery lasts for a long time - what more could you ask for?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toddler must have!
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my little one to use with her Amazon Fire tablet. She also has sensitivities to loud noises as well as my (what we call) "bat hearing" lolShe loves them!She doesn't like things on her head, but she loves these!She will oftentimes wear them to both hear her tablet but also tune out noises in the home (such as me doing dishes)Many times she has surprised me when I've noticed they've helped her tune out the sounds of me doing dishes or watching TV - but if I say her name (absentmindedly forgetting she has them on) she will respond. That tells me they help cancel noises that seem to overload her- but don't block sounds out enough that she can't hear important noises.I was very worried about the setup process as I was struggling at first - but once I googled the process per her device, it was a simple 5 second process.They've now become an everyday staple in our home and I struggle to remember how we managed without them as not only are they an adorable pair of headphones - they've also become a crucial tool in sensory input management at home.Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewTitle: On recommande ce produit, vraiment très bonne.
reviews.reviewText: Excellent produit, très bonne qualité, ma fille a tombé en amour avec

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Mijn kleindochter krijgt deze koptelefoon bij haar tablet voor haar verjaardag. Zelf even getest op mijn eigen tablet en hij werkt fantastisch. Goed geluid en leuk met alle lampjes die je aan en uit kan zetten.

Für meine Tochter zu Weihnachten gekauft, super angekommen, funktionieren einwandfrei, super Sound und sehen echt cool aus. Toll ist, dass sie bunt leuchten, aber dass man das auch ausstellen kann. Kann ich sehr empfehlen!
